app_config__app_config__label.description: Title for the section of the application that contains new app configuration settings.

app_config__app_name__help.description: Help text for the app configuration setting that controls the new application name.
app_config__app_name__help.message: Название в Интернет-магазине Chrome и в окне самого приложения (если отображается).

app_config__app_name__label.description: Title for the app configuration setting that controls the new application name.

app_config__app_name__placeholder.description: Placeholder value for the new application name

app_config__back_button__title.description: Title of the button to perform a back navigation action

app_config__download_button__title.description: Title of the button to perform a download action

app_config__enable_home_btn__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that controls whether to show navigation buttons

app_config__enable_logout_btn__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that controls whether to show a Logout button (labeled 'Restart session')

app_config__enable_nav_btns__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that controls whether to show navigation buttons
app_config__enable_nav_btns__label.message: Показывать кнопки перехода вперед и назад

app_config__enable_navigation_bar__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that controls whether to show the navigation bar

app_config__enable_reload_btn__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that controls whether to show the reload button

app_config__export_app__label.description: Title for the button that exports the newly configured application

app_config__forward_button__title.description: Title of the button to perform a forward navigation action

app_config__home_button__title.description: Title of the button to perform a home navigation action

app_config__homepage__help.description: Help text for the application configuration setting that controls what the new application default homepage URL will be
app_config__homepage__help.message: Стартовая страница приложения. Также открывается, если пользователь нажимает кнопку перехода на главную страницу.

app_config__homepage__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that controls what the new application default homepage URL will be

app_config__kiosk_enabled__help.description: Help text for the application configuration setting that determines whether Kiosk mode is enabled
app_config__kiosk_enabled__help.message: Приложение работает в режиме киоска. Если функция выключена, оно становится стандартным приложением Chrome.

app_config__kiosk_enabled__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that determines whether Kiosk mode is enabled

app_config__logout_button__title.description: Title of the button to perform a log out

app_config__reload_button__title.description: Title of the button to perform a reload

app_config__remove_button__title.description: Title of the button to perform a remove action

app_config__rotation__help.description: Help text the application configuration setting that determines the degree to which the screen should be rotated

app_config__rotation__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that determines the degree to which the screen should be rotated

app_config__session_data_timeout_time__h.description: Help text for the application configuration setting that controls the session idle timeout
app_config__session_data_timeout_time__h.message: Время бездействия приложения (в минутах) перед удалением данных о работе в браузере.

app_config__session_data_timeout_time__l.description: Title for the application configuration setting that controls the session idle timeout

app_config__session_timeout_time__help.description: Help text for the application configuration setting that controls the session idle timeout
app_config__session_timeout_time__help.message: Время бездействия приложения (в минутах) перед возвратом на главную страницу. Данные об работе в браузере сохраняются.

app_config__session_timeout_time__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that controls the session idle timeout
app_config__session_timeout_time__label.message: Время ожидания перед возвратом на главную страницу

app_config__terms_of_service__help.description: Help text for the application configuration setting that determines the terms of service
app_config__terms_of_service__help.message: Условия использования, которые необходимо принять для работы с киоском.

app_config__terms_of_service__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that determines the terms of service

app_config__terms_of_service__placeholde.description: Placeholder for the application configuration setting that determines the terms of service

app_config__version__help.description: Help text for the application configuration setting that controls the new application version number.

app_config__version__label.description: Title for the application configuration setting that controls the new application version number.

app_welcome_text_pt1.message: В разделе "Конфигурация приложения" ниже укажите его атрибуты: главную страницу, элементы навигации и время ожидания в той или иной ситуации. После того, как вы укажете URL главной страницы, она начнет отображаться вместо этого текста.

app_welcome_text_pt2.message: Когда все будет готово, создайте архив содержимого папки приложения и экспортируйте приложение.

app_welcome_text_pt4.message: создать киоск-приложение Chrome с помощью Chrome App Builder.

app_welcome_title.message: Добро пожаловать в Chrome App Builder!

appname.description: Title of the Chrome App name. [CHAR LIMIT=44]

appname_beta.description: Title of the Chrome App name. [CHAR LIMIT=44]

appname_dev.description: Title of the Chrome App name. [CHAR LIMIT=44]

upload_help_text.description: Text for small link to the upload help
